title: Open Connection File Menu Option Does Not Work w/ SQL Server Functionality Enabled
author: dezryth
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
When "Use SQL Server to load & save connections" is enabled from options, the "Open Connection File..." menu option does not work and does not notify the user of the issue. Functionality is restored after disabling the SQL Server option.
